raw_body: Rev. Sister GERALDINE PERERA,​ Sister of Charity of Jesus and Mary is called to the Lord. Her remains lie at Sacred Heart Convent,​ Galle. Funeral Mass will be at 10 a.m. on Wednesday,​ the 27th September 2023 followed by Burial at Dadalla Cemetery,​ Galle. Please be united in Prayer. Informed by : the Provincial Superior of Sisters of Charity of Jesus and Mary. Rev. Sr. Patsy Pitchai.061068
